"Phantom":
"Phantom is a Successor Class which combines strong evasive abilities with a wide variety of attacks.

Phantoms are able to equip Rods, Katanas and Rifles. However, they use them in vastly different ways from how they work in the hands of any other Class.

Rod
Combo attacks with PAs and Techniques.
Katana
High maneuverability, high power.
Rifles
Attacks that employ the assistance of \"Bits\"."

"To change to the Phantom Class, you must first complete a specific Client Order.

To complete this Client Order, you will need to earn a Title whose conditions are getting 2 or more Classes to Lv. 75 or higher."

"Phantom is different from other Classes in a number of ways:

・Cannot set a Subclass
(If a Quest has level restrictions that refer to your Subclass, only consider the level of your Main Class.)

・Some Potentials and Skill Rings have no effect
(E.g. Battle Awakening, R/Attack Advance, etc.)

・Has its own set of level cap release orders
・Support Partners cannot have their Class set to Phantom"
